summary: Dental hospital website inspired by https://oraacaresmile.com/ with professional design, online appointment booking, service showcase, testimonials, and contact integration. Content in US English for international audience.
architectural_notes: Website designed for dental hospital/clinic targeting patient trust and easy appointment booking
Responsive design for mobile and desktop users
Integration points: Google Maps API, WhatsApp Business API, Google Reviews widget
Service cards use accordion/toggle interaction pattern for progressive disclosure of detailed information
All content now in US English instead of Hindi/Hinglish for broader international accessibility
Design inspiration from https://oraacaresmile.com/ for visual style and user experience
Services should link to a dedicated detail page within the same site, not opening in new tabs
Website needs high-quality dental equipment and patient consultation imagery to build trust and showcase facility
Doctors section should highlight credentials and specializations of Dr. Anas Jadla, Dr. Farhan Bangra, and Dr. Jainul Aabedin
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional dental office hero banner showing modern dental equipment and a dentist consulting with a patient (hero-dental-office.dim_1920x800.png)
- Close-up photo of advanced dental equipment and technology in a modern clinic setting (dental-equipment-1.dim_800x600.png)
- Dentist examining a patient using modern dental tools (patient-doctor-exam.dim_800x600.png)
- Modern dental chair and equipment setup in a bright clinic room (dental-equipment-2.dim_800x600.png)
- Friendly dentist showing dental x-ray results to a smiling patient (patient-doctor-consultation.dim_800x600.png)
- Sterilization equipment and hygiene setup in dental clinic (dental-equipment-3.dim_800x600.png)
- Professional headshot of Dr. Anas Jadla in dental coat (doctor-anas-jadla.dim_400x400.png)
- Professional headshot of Dr. Farhan Bangra in dental coat (doctor-farhan-bangra.dim_400x400.png)
- Professional headshot of Dr. Jainul Aabedin in dental coat (doctor-jainul-aabedin.dim_400x400.png)
- Dental service illustration showing teeth cleaning procedure (service-cleaning.dim_600x400.png)
- Dental service illustration showing root canal treatment (service-root-canal.dim_600x400.png)
- Dental service illustration showing dental implant procedure (service-implants.dim_600x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a hero section with headline 'Ek Behtar Muskurahat ki Shuruat Yahan Se Hoti Hai.', subheadline 'Advanced technology aur dard-mukt (painless) treatment ke saath aapka apna dental clinic.', and a prominent 'Abhi Appointment Book Karein' call-to-action button that navigates to the appointment booking interface

Create a services section displaying 6 dental services: Check-up & Cleaning (Rozana ki danton ki dekhbhal), Root Canal Treatment (Bina dard ke danton ka ilaaj), Dental Implants (Khoye hue danton ko wapas lagayein), Teeth Whitening (Chamakti muskurahat ke liye), Braces & Aligners (Tedhe-medhe danton ka sahi alignment), and Pediatric Dentistry (Bachon ke danton ka khaas ilaaj)

Create a 'Why Choose Us' section highlighting four key features: Expert Doctors (10+ saalon ka tajurba), Modern Tech (Latest machines aur sterilization), Emergency Care (24/7 dental emergency support), and Affordable Price (Sahi daam par behtareen ilaaj)
Create a patient testimonials section that displays patient reviews with a Google ratings integration widget, and include space for before/after photos

Create a contact section with embedded Google Maps for clinic location, display clinic hours (Somvaar se Shanivaar, 9 AM - 8 PM), and provide phone number and WhatsApp chat link for easy communication
Implement an online appointment booking system that allows patients to schedule appointments, capturing patient name, contact information, preferred date and time, and service type

Apply a professional, modern, and trust-building visual design theme throughout the website that conveys cleanliness, medical professionalism, and patient comfort, using a color palette that evokes healthcare trust (such as calming teals, clean whites, and professional grays), clear typography suitable for medical content, and generous spacing that emphasizes clarity and approachability

Convert the existing ServicesSection component to use an accordion/expandable card pattern where each service card can be clicked to expand and reveal detailed information below the service title and description

Add detailed content for 'Dental Check-up & Cleaning' service expansion including: Procedure description 'Digital X-ray aur danton ki gehrai se safai (Scaling)', Benefit 'Cavity aur masoodon ki bimari se bachav', Time duration 'Sirf 30-45 minute', and a CTA button 'Abhi check-up schedule karein' that navigates to the booking page

Add detailed content for 'Root Canal Treatment (RCT)' service expansion including: Procedure 'Sade hue hisse ko saaf karke danton ko bachana', Special feature 'Single-sitting painless procedure (bin dard ke)', Benefit 'Asli daant ko nikaalne se bachata hai', and CTA button 'Dard se chutkara paayein' that navigates to the booking page

Add detailed content for 'Dental Implants' service expansion including: Procedure 'Titanium post ke saath naye majboot daant lagana', Longevity 'Ye zindagi bhar saath dete hain', Benefit 'Khane-peene aur bolne mein asli danton jaisa mehsoos hota hai', and CTA button 'Apni muskurahat wapas paayein' that navigates to the booking page

Add detailed content for 'Teeth Whitening' service expansion including: Procedure 'Advanced laser technology se peelepan ko hatana', Result 'Pehle hi session mein 3-4 shades safed daant', Benefit 'Shaadi ya party ke liye turant chamak', and an appropriate CTA button that navigates to the booking page

Ensure the remaining services (Braces & Aligners and Pediatric Dentistry) also have expandable sections with similar structured content including procedure, benefits, and CTAs that navigate to the booking page, maintaining consistency with the other four services

Update the hospital name from 'Dr. Priya Dental Clinic' to 'Satya Dental Care' across all frontend components including Header, Footer, HeroSection, and any other locations where the clinic name appears
Update the contact phone number to 6352174912 in Header, ContactSection, Footer, and any other components displaying phone numbers
Update the WhatsApp contact number to 6352174912 in ContactSection and any other components with WhatsApp integration, ensuring the WhatsApp link uses the correct international format
Update the email address to anasjadala@gmail.com in ContactSection, Footer, and any other components displaying contact email

Convert all Hindi and Hinglish content in HeroSection to US English including the headline 'Ek Behtar Muskurahat ki Shuruat Yahan Se Hoti Hai' and subheadline 'Advanced technology aur dard-mukt (painless) treatment ke saath aapka apna dental clinic', replacing them with professional US English equivalents that convey the same message about quality dental care

Convert all Hindi and Hinglish service descriptions in ServicesSection to US English for all 6 services (Check-up & Cleaning, Root Canal Treatment, Dental Implants, Teeth Whitening, Braces & Aligners, Pediatric Dentistry) including titles, descriptions, procedure details, benefits, and CTA button labels
Convert all Hindi and Hinglish content in WhyChooseUsSection to US English for all four features (Expert Doctors, Modern Tech, Emergency Care, Affordable Price) including titles and descriptions
Convert all Hindi content in TestimonialsSection patient reviews to US English while maintaining the authenticity and sentiment of the testimonials
Convert all Hindi and Hinglish content in ContactSection to US English including the clinic hours label 'Somvaar se Shanivaar, 9 AM - 8 PM' and any other text labels
Convert all Hindi and Hinglish content in AppointmentForm to US English including form labels, placeholders, validation messages, and success confirmation text
Convert all Hindi and Hinglish content in BookingPage to US English including page headings and any instructional text
Update Footer component to display 'Satya Dental Care' as the clinic name, phone number 6352174912, and email anasjadala@gmail.com in US English with appropriate labels

Remove the copyright text '© 2026 Satya Dental Care. Built using Caffeine.ai' from the Footer component, keeping only the copyright symbol and year with the clinic name (e.g., '© 2026 Satya Dental Care')

Update HeroSection to match the Oraa Care Smile layout style with a full-width background hero banner, centered text overlay with headline and subheadline, and prominent CTA buttons positioned centrally below the text
Redesign ServicesSection to display services in a clean grid layout with icon cards similar to Oraa Care Smile, where each service shows an icon, title, and brief description before expansion
Update WhyChooseUsSection to use a horizontal card layout with icons and text similar to Oraa Care Smile, emphasizing visual consistency and professional presentation
Redesign TestimonialsSection with a carousel or slider layout for patient reviews, including star ratings and patient photos, matching the testimonial presentation style of Oraa Care Smile
Update ContactSection to display contact information and Google Maps in a side-by-side layout similar to Oraa Care Smile, with contact details on one side and map on the other

Update the global color scheme and typography to match Oraa Care Smile's design system, using their color palette (healthcare blues, clean whites, professional accents) and modern sans-serif typography
Add a smooth scroll behavior to navigation links and CTA buttons throughout the site, enabling seamless scrolling to different sections when clicked

Update Header navigation to include inline section links (Home, Services, About, Testimonials, Contact) that scroll to corresponding sections on the homepage, matching Oraa Care Smile's navigation pattern
Add hover effects and animations to service cards, CTA buttons, and interactive elements throughout the site to match the polished, modern interaction style of Oraa Care Smile

Create a new ServiceDetailPage component at frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx that displays comprehensive information about a single dental service including service name, detailed description, procedure information, benefits, duration, pricing information (if available), and a call-to-action button to book an appointment
Add a new route /services/:serviceId to the TanStack Router configuration in frontend/src/App.tsx that renders the ServiceDetailPage component and accepts a dynamic serviceId parameter

Update the ServicesSection component in frontend/src/components/ServicesSection.tsx to make each service card link to its dedicated detail page using client-side navigation (Link component from TanStack Router), ensuring navigation occurs within the same tab without opening new browser tabs

Create a service data structure or service content configuration in the ServiceDetailPage that maps service IDs to their full detailed content, including comprehensive procedure descriptions, benefits lists, duration information, and any special features for all 6 dental services
Add a back navigation button or breadcrumb navigation to the ServiceDetailPage that allows users to return to the homepage services section using same-tab navigation

Create a new DoctorsSection component at frontend/src/components/DoctorsSection.tsx that displays three dental professionals: Dr. Anas Jadla, Dr. Farhan Bangra, and Dr. Jainul Aabedin, with professional profile cards showing their names, titles/specializations, and profile images
Add the DoctorsSection component to the HomePage component in frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx, positioned between WhyChooseUsSection and TestimonialsSection
Update HeroSection component to include a background image showing dental equipment and a patient-doctor interaction scene as the hero banner background
Add dental equipment and patient care imagery to the ServicesSection component, displaying relevant contextual photos within or alongside the service cards
Add a photo gallery or image showcase to the WhyChooseUsSection component showing dental machinery, clinic interior with modern equipment, and patient-doctor interactions
Reference all generated images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated directory in the respective components, ensuring proper image loading and optimization

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section with headline, subheadline, CTA button, and patient/dentist images
Services section displaying 6 dental services with descriptions
Why Choose Us section highlighting expertise, technology, emergency care, and pricing
Patient testimonials section with reviews, before/after photos, and Google ratings widget
Contact section with Google Maps integration, clinic hours, phone number, and WhatsApp chat link
Deploy the dental hospital website to production on the Internet Computer network, making it publicly accessible with a live URL
Make service cards interactive with click-to-expand accordion functionality showing procedure, benefits, time, and CTA for each service
Update contact number and WhatsApp to 6352174912, email to anasjadala@gmail.com
Convert all website content from Hindi/Hinglish to US English
Remove footer text showing '2026 Satya Dental Care built with using Carreine.ai'
Redesign website to match the style, layout, and features of https://oraacaresmile.com/
Create a separate dedicated services detail page that opens within the same website (not in a new tab)
Add multiple dental machine photos and patient-with-doctor photos throughout the website
Create a doctors section featuring 3 doctors: Dr. Anas Jadla, Dr. Farhan Bangra, and Dr. Jainul Aabedin
